report.title: List of Ecobat reference range imports
report.description: Lists each import event and the count of records added by it.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM ecobat_occurrences o JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id WHERE o.import_guid IS NOT NULL AND o.external_key IS NOT NULL AND o.autogenerated=FALSE

param.description: List of 10km map squares to include
